Hey guys , this is my second preset i share on Nexus .[/i]
[i]Her Name is Erika , hope you guys like her

You Like her ? and want to add her as a Follower ? Dont worry , [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10907738]Ashes2Asherz[/url] already Convert her as a Follower

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77382/?]Erika the Shao'kai Assassin[/url]
[b][i]by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10907738]Ashes2Asherz[/url][/i][/b]

[/url][/u][/i][/b][i][b][u]ENB Preset Used in Screenshots[/u]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70451/?]Snapdragon Prime ENB[/url]


[size=4][u][i][b] HOW TO INSTALL[/b][/i][/u][/size][size=3]  
[/size]
[size=3]1.Use NMM or extract to your data folder.[/size]
[size=3]2.Go into racemenu with your console  [/size]
[size=3]3.Set race to Nord and go to the presets tab , Press F9 to load the preset.[/size]
[size=3][u]4.Select the one called "Erika Preset.jslot"[/u]

|
|
|

[i][b][u]PERMISSION[/u]
[size=3]If you want to use my Preset in mod , you dont need permission from me , Just Credit Me .[/size][/b][/i]
